content: संग्रहणं {@--1@} Seizing, grasping. {@--2@} Supporting, encouraging. {@--3@} Compiling, collecting. {@--4@} Blending. {@--5@} Incasing, setting; कनक्रभूषणसंग्रहणोत्रितः (मणिः) <ls>Pt. 1. 75.</ls> {@--6@} Sexual union, intercourse with a female. {@--7@} Adultery; <ls>Ms. 8. 6</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">72</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 72.</ls> {@--8@} Hoping. {@--9@} Accepting, receiving. --णी Dysentery.
